SEARCH

Hospital_Management_System API Documentation (v1.0-SNAPSHOT)

Packages
Package
Description
org.bee
 
org.bee.controllers
The controllers package manages the Controller classes in the healthcare management system.
org.bee.execeptions
This package is for exception classes for handling Zoom API errors.
org.bee.hms.auth
Authentication interfaces for healthcare system users Contains the SystemUser interface for username-based authentication
org.bee.hms.billing
Manages financial operations and transactions in the healthcare management system.
org.bee.hms.claims
This package contains classes related to insurance claims in the healthcare management system.
org.bee.hms.humans
Contains all domain classes representing core human entities in the healthcare insurance system.
org.bee.hms.insurance
Contains insurance provider implementations for the healthcare management system.
org.bee.hms.medical
This package contains medical-related classes for the healthcare management system.
org.bee.hms.policy
Contains core insurance policy classes including: Policy types (BaseInsurancePolicy, HeldInsurancePolicy) Coverage details (BaseCoverage, CompositeCoverage, CoverageLimit) Claim processing (ClaimableItem, InsuranceCoverageResult) Enums and rules (AccidentType, BenefitType, InsuranceStatus, ExclusionCriteria)
org.bee.hms.telemed
Provides telemedicine functionality for the Hospital Management System.
org.bee.hms.wards
The wards package provides ward-related classes for the patient.
org.bee.pages
The org.bee.pages package contains CLI pages for all user types
org.bee.pages.clerk
The org.bee.pages.clerk package provides the CLI interface for the clerk
org.bee.pages.clerk.billing
Billing management system for clerks in the hospital management system.
org.bee.pages.clerk.insurance
Billing management system for clerks with claim processing capabilities
org.bee.pages.doctor
The org.bee.pages.doctor package provides the CLI interface for the doctor
org.bee.pages.patient
The org.bee.pages.patient package provides the CLI interface for the patient
org.bee.ui
Central package for managing UI components and application in the framework.
org.bee.ui.details
Provides interfaces for creating adapter components that configure detail views for domain objects.
org.bee.ui.exception
Provides exception classes specific to the UI framework.
org.bee.ui.forms
Provides a framework for creating and managing dynamic form elements and validation in the UI.
org.bee.ui.views
Provides view components for the UI framework terminal-based interface.
org.bee.utils
Utility classes for the Bee application framework.
org.bee.utils.detailAdapters
Package containing detail adapters for the Bee application.
org.bee.utils.formAdapters
Package containing form adapters for the Bee application.
org.bee.utils.jackson
This is a utility class for Jackson serialization and deserialization.
